snippet: Viki Knox, a teacher at Union High School in Union Township, N.J., wrote that homosexuality was “against the nature and character of God.”
lead_paragraph: Viki Knox, a teacher at Union High School in Union Township, N.J., wrote that homosexuality was “against the nature and character of God.”

headline.main: New Jersey High School Teacher Posts Anti-Gay Entry on Facebook
headline.print_headline: Teacher Posts Anti-Gay Entry on Facebook
headline.seo: Teacher’s Facebook Posts Against Homosexuality Are Questioned
